result.title: #AnneFrank. Parallel Stories
result.overview: One single Anne Frank moves us more than the countless others who suffered just as she did but whose faces have remained in the shadows-Primo Levi. The Oscar®-winning Helen Mirren will introduce audiences to Anne Frank's story through the words in her diary. The set will be her room in the secret refuge in Amsterdam, reconstructed in every detail by set designers from the Piccolo Theatre in Milan. Anne Frank this year would have been 90 years old. Anne's story is intertwined with that of five Holocaust survivors, teenage girls just like her, with the same ideals, the same desire to live: Arianna Szörenyi, Sarah Lichtsztejn-Montard, Helga Weiss and sisters Andra and Tatiana Bucci. Their testimonies alternate with those of their children and grandchildren.

Nollywood superstars Ramsey Nouah, Rita Dominic, and Chidi Mokeme headline this gripping drama set against the backdrop of the attempted 1976 military coup against the government of General Murtala Mohammed.

result.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
result.overview: An American Ambassador is killed during an attack at a U.S. compound in Libya as a security team struggles to make sense out of the chaos.
result.originalTitle: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
result.tagline: When everything went wrong, six men had the courage to do what was right.

result.title: 13 Reasons Why
result.overview: After a teenage girl's perplexing suicide, a classmate receives a series of tapes that unravel the mystery of her tragic choice.
result.tagline: If you're listening, you're too late.

seasons.title: Season 1
seasons.overview: After a teenage girl's perplexing suicide, a classmate receives a series of tapes that unravel the mystery of her tragic choice.

episodes.title: Tape 1, Side A
episodes.overview: As the school mourns the death of Hannah Baker, her friend Clay receives a box of tapes with messages she recorded before she committed suicide.

episodes.title: Tape 1, Side B
episodes.overview: Hannah makes friends with Jessica and Alex, two other new students. Justin doesn't show up at school, and Hannah's mother finds something troubling.

episodes.title: Tape 2, Side A
episodes.overview: Jealousy and gossip take a toll on Hannah's relationships. As Alex struggles with feelings regret, the guys pressure Clay into getting drunk.

episodes.title: Tape 2, Side B
episodes.overview: Hannah thinks someone is stalking her and sets a trap. Hannah's mother confronts the principal, and Clay strikes back at someone who wronged Hannah.

episodes.title: Tape 3, Side A
episodes.overview: Hannah and Clay connect at the school dance, but a crass rumor ruins the mood. Clay takes Courtney to visit Hannah's grave.

episodes.title: Tape 3, Side B
episodes.overview: Hannah's date on Valentine's Day doens't go as planned. Alex gets in a big fight at school and has to face the honor board.

episodes.title: Tape 4, Side A
episodes.overview: Another student sabotages Hannah during a class project. Clay's nightmares about Hannah spill over into the daytime.

episodes.title: Tape 4, Side B
episodes.overview: Inspired by a friend's poetry reading, Hannah pours her heart out. Tony confides in Clay about the night of Hannah's death.

episodes.title: Tape 5, Side A
episodes.overview: Hannah witnesses a traumatic event at a summertime party. Clay tries to reason with Justin, and Marcus warns him that the worst is yet to come.

episodes.title: Tape 5, Side B
episodes.overview: A distraught Hannah gets a ride home from the party. Jessica's behavior grows increasingly erratic, and Clay learns the truth behind a tragedy.

episodes.title: Tape 6, Side A
episodes.overview: Clay and Hannah grow closer. While Clay spends a heartbraking night listening to his tape with Tony, tensions boil over at Bryce's house.

episodes.title: Tape 6, Side B
episodes.overview: Hannah winds up at a party after an argument with her parents. The students are served with subpoenas, and Justin wrestles with conflicting loyalties.

episodes.title: Tape 7, Side A
episodes.overview: Hannah seeks help from Mr. Porter, the school counselor. Clay plays the new tape for Tony and weighs what to do next.

seasons.title: Season 2
seasons.overview: Memories of Hannah haunt Clay as a lawsuit against the school goes to trial, and more startling secrets emerge as the students testify.

episodes.title: The First Polaroid
episodes.overview: Five months after Hannah's death, the case against Liberty goes to trial, with Tyler as the first witness. Clay finds a troubling photo in his locker.

episodes.title: Two Girls Kissing
episodes.overview: Courtney makes a brave decision. Clay's memories of Hannah drive a wedge between him and Skye. Someone trashes the yearbook office.

episodes.title: The Drunk Slut
episodes.overview: Worried about threats against them, Alex and Clay urge Jessica to testify about Bryce. Clay enlists Tony's help to find a potential witness.

episodes.title: The Second Polaroid
episodes.overview: Clay hides a secret from his parents. Concerned about his reputation, Marcus lies in court. Jessica and Alex skip school together.

episodes.title: The Chalk Machine
episodes.overview: Tyler and Cyrus embrace their outsider status. Alex fights to recover his lost memories. Ryan and Mrs. Baker look to Hannah's poems for clues.

episodes.title: The Smile at the End of the Dock
episodes.overview: Clay tries to figure out where the Polaroids were taken. Justin shows up at school. Zach's revelation about Hannah takes everyone by surprise.

episodes.title: The Third Polaroid
episodes.overview: Alex blows up at Bryce. Someone blackmails Marcus. Clay testifies about a night he and Hannah spent together. Jessica experiences a flashback.

episodes.title: The Little Girl
episodes.overview: When Hannah's parents come under scrutiny, Jessica reaches out to Mrs. Baker. Justin struggles to stay clean. Clay reconnects with Skye.

episodes.title: The Missing Page
episodes.overview: Tyler goes out with Cyrus's sister. Chloe confronts Bryce about the tapes. Jess wonders if she's ready to date again. Mr. Porter wrestles with regret.

episodes.title: Smile, Bitches
episodes.overview: Tony opens up about his past. Sheri devises a plan to get into the clubhouse. Mr. Porter tries to help Justin. Zach and Bryce butt heads.

episodes.title: Bryce and Chloe
episodes.overview: Chaos erupts at school in the aftermath of Bryce's testimony. Jessica tells Chloe about the clubhouse. Alex's memories come rushing back.

episodes.title: The Box of Polaroids
episodes.overview: Threats against Clay and the others escalate. Tyler faces disciplinary action. Justin testifies about Bryce, putting his own future at risk.

episodes.title: Bye
episodes.overview: One month later, Hannah's loved ones celebrate her life and find comfort in each other. Meanwhile, a brutal assault pushes one student over the edge.

seasons.title: Season 3
seasons.overview: Months after the Spring Fling, Liberty High is hit with a new shock when Bryce Walker is murdered the night of homecoming ... and everyone is a suspect.

episodes.title: Yeah. I'm the New Girl
episodes.overview: The cops question Clay about Bryce's disappearance. Clay remembers the aftermath of Spring Fling, when he raced to cover Tyler's tracks and met Ani.

episodes.title: If You're Breathing, You're a Liar
episodes.overview: After learning about Chloe's pregnancy, Clay and Ani pay her a visit. Chloe recalls how she leaned on Zach for support -- and that Bryce never knew.

episodes.title: The Good Person Is Indistinguishable from the Bad
episodes.overview: As the police investigation sets the school on edge, Ani remembers that Jessica confronted Bryce. Growing suspicious of Jess, Ani and Clay follow her.

episodes.title: Angry, Young and Man
episodes.overview: After Tyler admits he still has a gun, the group keeps tabs on him at school. But their worry deepens when they learn he had a motive to kill Bryce.

episodes.title: Nobody's Clean
episodes.overview: The police search the school after finding steroids in Bryce's car. Alex remembers how Bryce supported Alex after Jessica dumped him.

episodes.title: You Can Tell the Heart of a Man by How He Grieves
episodes.overview: The police bring in Tony for questioning. At Bryce's funeral, Ani uncovers two damning secrets.

episodes.title: There Are a Number of Problems with Clay Jensen
episodes.overview: The police interrogate Justin and Clay about the night Clay pulled a gun on Bryce. Clay discovers that Ani and Bryce's bond ran deeper than he realized.

episodes.title: In High School, Even on a Good Day, It's Hard to Tell Who's on Your Side
episodes.overview: Mr. Porter interviews students about Clay, who pleads his innocence to Mrs. Walker. Learning Porter counseled Bryce, Clay and Ani question his motives.

episodes.title: Always Waiting for the Next Bad News
episodes.overview: The cops name Clay as a person of interest in the murder. Ani catches Justin in a lie after learning Bryce bailed him out of a dangerous situation.

episodes.title: The World Closing In
episodes.overview: Hannah's mother returns to town. Urging Clay to protect himself, she reveals that there was more to Tony and Bryce's relationship than Clay knew.

episodes.title: There Are a Few Things I Haven't Told You
episodes.overview: As the cops close in on Clay -- their main suspect -- violent confrontations at the homecoming game expose that everyone had a reason to kill Bryce.

episodes.title: And Then the Hurricane Hit
episodes.overview: The pressure of Clay’s arrest leads his friends to make risky decisions, and the full story of the brawl that erupted at homecoming emerges.

episodes.title: Let the Dead Bury the Dead
episodes.overview: Clay is released on bail, Ani puts a plan to exonerate him into action, and the truth about Bryce's murder finally comes to light.

seasons.title: Season 4
seasons.overview: Liberty High School’s senior class is preparing for graduation, but before they say goodbye, they’ll have to keep a dangerous secret buried and face heartbreaking choices that could impact their futures forever.

episodes.title: Winter Break
episodes.overview: The police question Tyler about the guns, leaving the friends rattled. Winston transfers to Liberty High after getting expelled from Hillcrest.

episodes.title: College Tour
episodes.overview: After an incident at school, Clay thinks someone's trying to set him up. Zach and Clay land in hot water during a college tour.

episodes.title: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: As the school gears up for the Love Is Love dance on Valentine's Day, disturbing phone calls keep Clay from getting in the spirit.

episodes.title: Senior Camping Trip
episodes.overview: Clay is forced to confront his anxiety on the senior camping trip as a suspicious email threatens to turn the friends against each other.

episodes.title: House Party
episodes.overview: The Jensens make the boys take a drug test. When the Liberty parents learn about an upcoming party, Clay suspects that they're tracking the students.

episodes.title: Thursday
episodes.overview: The school goes into lockdown, and Clay, Tony and Justin worry about Tyler's whereabouts.

episodes.title: College Interview
episodes.overview: Clay's mental health continues to decline as the friends wrestle with difficult emotions during their college admissions interviews.

episodes.title: Acceptance/Rejection
episodes.overview: In the wake of the lockdown, the school is on edge — and a troubling abuse of power pushes the students to take action.

episodes.title: Prom
episodes.overview: When the dean begins a new investigation and threatens to cancel prom, the friends decide to confide in their parents ... but not about everything.

episodes.title: Graduation
episodes.overview: Strengthened by the struggles they've endured, the friends say goodbye to high school and look toward the future in an emotional series finale.

result.title: 13: The Musical
result.overview: After moving from New York City to Indiana, a 12 year old navigates his parents' divorce, his impending bar mitzvah and his new school's social circles.
result.tagline: Raise your voice. Even if it cracks.

result.overview: A simple yet proud rancher conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to participate.

Ben Campbell is a young, highly intelligent, student at M.I.T. who strives to succeed. Wanting a scholarship to transfer to Harvard School of Medicine to become a doctor, Ben learns that he cannot afford the $300,000 tuition as he comes from a poor, working-class background. But one evening, Ben is introduced by his unorthodox math professor to  a small but secretive club.  Students Jill, Choi, Kianna, and Fisher, who are being trained by Professor Rosa in to count cards at blackjack.
result.tagline: They proved the Vegas Blackjack System was beatable...by beating the hell out of it.

result.title: 22 July
result.overview: On 22 July 2011, neo-Nazi terrorist Anders Behring Breivik murdered 77 young people attending a Labour Party Youth Camp on Utøya Island outside of Oslo. This three-part story focuses on the survivors, the political leadership of Norway, and the lawyers involved.
result.tagline: The true story of a day that started like any other
